result.reason: Feature request for dynamic/virtual connection groups that auto-populate based on criteria like currently connected or recently used connections
result.approach: Add SmartGroup concept with filter predicates (connected, recent, protocol-based) that dynamically populate virtual folders in the connection tree without modifying the persisted tree structure
